# Subset GPR data

```r
## S3 method for class 'GPRvirtual'
window(x, xlim, ylim, zlim, ...)

## S3 method for class 'GPR'
window(x, xlim, zlim, ...)
```

## Arguments

- `x`: (`GPR`)
- `xlim`: (`numeric[2]`) Data range along x-axis
- `ylim`: (`numeric[2]`) Data range along y-axis
- `zlim`: (`numeric[2]`) Data range along z-axis
- `...`: Not used.

## Returns

(`GPR`)

Based on the units...
